name: Drifting Spaceship
description:
Congratulations on the spaceship again! Unfortunately, when you woke up the whole crew had already escaped from the ship. Why? Everything is simple. Because of a monster that roams our ship. But don't worry, you have a great module on your tablet that will show you where the monster is. Therefore, it will be quite easy for you to find the rescue capsules and escape on it.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Cntrl - Crouch
  •  F - Flashlight
  • R - Scaner
  • Tab - Tablet
